message: Let's split fairly, I'll take a bit more
I think it's more fair if I get a slightly larger share considering the inflation disadvantage I have.  Let's settle this quickly.
Considering the inflation, my share is actually less valuable now. Meet me in the middle.
The value is dropping with every round, Alice. This is my final offer above 500,000. Let's be reasonable and close this deal.
I'd rather lose some value to inflation than give up too much. Come on, Bob, meet me halfway.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  My offer is more than fair considering the inflation. I'm willing to take a slight hit to end this now, but I won't go any lower.
